faqs.question: What is Okal Specials?
faqs.answer: Okal Specials is a curated collection of premium, limited-time, and exclusive grocery deals offered by Okal. It includes combo packs, seasonal products, and value bundles at special prices.

faqs.question: Where can I find Okal Specials in the app?
faqs.answer: You can find Okal Specials on the home screen or under the 'Specials' tab in the Okal app, featuring the latest curated offers and discounts.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials available every day?
faqs.answer: Okal Specials are refreshed daily with new items and offers, but availability may vary by location.

faqs.question: Do Okal Specials include discounts on all items?
faqs.answer: Not all items are discounted, but Okal Specials feature top-value deals and exclusive offers across popular categories.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials available in all cities?
faqs.answer: Availability of Okal Specials depends on your city and local partner stores. Check your app to see whatâ€™s available in your area.

faqs.question: Can I combine Okal Specials with coupons or wallet offers?
faqs.answer: In most cases, Okal Specials cannot be combined with other coupons or wallet offers unless stated otherwise.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials products refundable or returnable?
faqs.answer: Most Okal Specials items are non-returnable due to their promotional nature, but damaged or expired items are eligible for refund or replacement.

faqs.question: How often does Okal update its Special offers?
faqs.answer: Special offers are updated frequently, often daily or weekly, based on inventory and ongoing campaigns.

faqs.question: Can I pre-order Okal Specials before they go live?
faqs.answer: Currently, pre-ordering Okal Specials is not available. You can purchase them only once the offer is live.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials different from regular discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal Specials feature limited-time deals, exclusive bundles, and handpicked offers that are not part of regular discounts.

faqs.question: Can I schedule delivery for Okal Specials items?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose your preferred delivery time for Specials items, subject to availability and local slot timings.

faqs.question: Do Okal Specials include festival or seasonal offers?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal runs themed Specials during festivals, holidays, and seasonal events with exclusive deals on relevant products.

faqs.question: What happens if an Okal Special item is out of stock?
faqs.answer: If a Special item goes out of stock, it will be automatically removed from your cart. You can check back later for restocks.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials applicable for Super Saver members?
faqs.answer: Yes, Super Saver members may get additional discounts or early access to Okal Specials.

faqs.question: Do Okal Specials have a minimum purchase amount?
faqs.answer: Some Special bundles may have a minimum order requirement, which will be mentioned in the offer details.

faqs.question: Can I reorder items from Okal Specials?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can reorder previous Specials from your order history if they are still available.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials curated manually or based on my shopping habits?
faqs.answer: Okal Specials are curated using a mix of popular trends, seasonal demand, and your shopping preferences.

faqs.question: Can I get notifications when new Specials are added?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can enable push notifications in the app to receive alerts about new Okal Specials and exclusive deals.

faqs.question: Are Okal Specials available for bulk or corporate orders?
faqs.answer: Some Special offers are available for bulk purchase. You can contact Okal support for bulk pricing options.

faqs.question: Do Okal Specials include organic or premium product lines?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal Specials often feature premium, organic, and farm-fresh collections sourced directly from trusted suppliers.
